name: How to use the Files sidebar
info:
Open the Node-RED editor → click the 'Files' sidebar tab.

Left panel header:
• Base: shows current base folder
• Change base…: set a new base (must be inside userDir, e.g., /data/projects/YourProject)
• Refresh: re-scan the current folder

Right panel:
• Click a file in the tree to open it
• Use New file / New folder to create items in the current directory
• Save to write edits back to disk

Base folder is persisted to ~/.node-red/.filebrowser.config.json (Docker: /data/.filebrowser.config.json).
